snippet: Mr. Fay was a founding member of the Grammy-winning traditional Irish band, which was formed in 1962.
abstract: Martin Fay, violinist who helped revive traditional Irish music as a founding member of the Chieftains, dies at age 76.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Fay was a founding member of the Grammy-winning traditional Irish band, which was formed in 1962.

headline.seo: Martin Fay, Fiddler With the Chieftains, Is Dead at 76
headline.main: Martin Fay, Fiddler With the Chieftains, Dies at 76
headline.print_headline: Martin Fay, 76, Fiddler With the Chieftains
